application.name: mar9combine
application.brief: Combines the VICAR and PDS labels to increase signal to noise

description.p: The Mariner 9 VICAR and PDS labels sometimes have different noise profiles. Comparing the images lets us find and remove some of the noise.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The VICAR or PDS cube (imported with mar92isis).

parameter.name: FROM2
parameter.description: The PDS or VICAR cube (imported with mar92isis).

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The resultant cube containing the clean data.
